trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous operation to add a message to the queue.
trans-unit.target: Begins an asynchronous operation to add a message to the queue.

trans-unit.source: An <codeEntityReference>T:System.AsyncCallback</codeEntityReference> delegate that will receive notification when the asynchronous operation completes.
trans-unit.target: An <codeEntityReference>T:System.AsyncCallback</codeEntityReference> delegate that will receive notification when the asynchronous operation completes.

trans-unit.source: A user-defined object that will be passed to the callback delegate.
trans-unit.target: A user-defined object that will be passed to the callback delegate.

trans-unit.source: An <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.ICancellableAsyncResult</codeEntityReference> that references the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: An <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.ICancellableAsyncResult</codeEntityReference> that references the asynchronous operation.

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous operation to add a message to the queue.
trans-unit.target: Begins an asynchronous operation to add a message to the queue.

trans-unit.source: A <codeEntityReference>T:System.TimeSpan</codeEntityReference> specifying the maximum time to allow the message to be in the queue, or <codeInline>null</codeInline>.
trans-unit.target: A <codeEntityReference>T:System.TimeSpan</codeEntityReference> specifying the maximum time to allow the message to be in the queue, or <codeInline>null</codeInline>.

trans-unit.source: A <codeEntityReference>T:System.TimeSpan</codeEntityReference> specifying the interval of time from now during which the message will be invisible.
trans-unit.target: A <codeEntityReference>T:System.TimeSpan</codeEntityReference> specifying the interval of time from now during which the message will be invisible.

trans-unit.source: If <codeInline>null</codeInline> then the message will be visible immediately.
trans-unit.target: If <codeInline>null</codeInline> then the message will be visible immediately.

trans-unit.source: A <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Queue.QueueRequestOptions</codeEntityReference> object that specifies additional options for the request.
trans-unit.target: A <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Queue.QueueRequestOptions</codeEntityReference> object that specifies additional options for the request.

trans-unit.source: An <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.OperationContext</codeEntityReference> object that represents the context for the current operation.
trans-unit.target: An <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.OperationContext</codeEntityReference> object that represents the context for the current operation.

trans-unit.source: An <codeEntityReference>T:System.AsyncCallback</codeEntityReference> delegate that will receive notification when the asynchronous operation completes.
trans-unit.target: An <codeEntityReference>T:System.AsyncCallback</codeEntityReference> delegate that will receive notification when the asynchronous operation completes.

trans-unit.source: A user-defined object that will be passed to the callback delegate.
trans-unit.target: A user-defined object that will be passed to the callback delegate.

trans-unit.source: An <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.ICancellableAsyncResult</codeEntityReference> that references the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: An <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.ICancellableAsyncResult</codeEntityReference> that references the asynchronous operation.
